name: Devil's Pong
description:
Devil's pong is a small game written in Scheme, the small, beautiful Lisp dialect. It is a one or two player game for Windows, OSX or Linux.

If you choose to buy the game for one dollar or more, I'll also answer any questions you have about the implementation or development with lambdanative. The source code is available for free here:

https://github.com/VincentToups/DevilsPong
